/**
 * # reducers
 *
 * This class combines all the reducers into one
 *
 */ /**
 * ## Imports
 */import customer from"./customer/reducer";import{combineReducers}from"redux";/**
 * ## CombineReducers
 * the rootReducer will call each and every reducer with the state and action
 * EVERY TIME there is a basic action
 */var rootReducer=combineReducers({customer:customer});export default rootReducer;
